actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to grant eligibility for home, condominium, and mobile home loan benefits to certain persons who are serving or have served in the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve of any of the reserve components of the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Makes specified reserve veterans eligible for veterans' home, condominium, and mobile home loan benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to grant eligibility for home, condominium, and mobile home loan benefits to certain persons who are serving or have served in the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve of any of the reserve components of the Armed Forces.
